content: this is a six-inch granny square that is great for using up scraps the finished square can be part of a blanket a sweater a purse or what you can imagine i make my squares with worsted weight yarn a 5 5 mm hook and a crochet gauge regulator https //medium com/free-crochet-patterns-and-tutorials/how-to-make-a-crochet-gauge-regulator-3a78acdc025f source=friends_link&skip=5de40ab15e5496088b9f6df540b5d0f9 it helps me hit my gauge so i seldom crochet without it it s a great way to use scraps and experiment with colors
